text:
Saya menginap 1 hari di Hotel baru ini, karena hotel ini baru dan lokasi strategis, saya penasaran transit di Hotel ini sebelum melanjutkan perjalanan besoknya ke Bukit Tinggi.

First look, terlihat standar santika premiere yaa.. lobby nyaman, walau bellboy sedikit kurang sigap melihat banyak koper yg harus diturunkan ketika arrival. Naik ke kamar, semuanya terlihat bersih dan rapi standard santika premiere, interior design nya mengingatkan saya dengan Santika Premiere Palembang. Very Homey. Dan saya istirahat dengan nyaman malam ini. Ketidak nyamanan muncul pagi ini, kebetulan pagi ini sekitar 08.30 terjadi Gempa di Padang dengan Pusat Gempa di Pasaman Barat sebesar 6.2 SR, yang mau saya highlite disini adalah STANDARD KESELAMATAN di hotel ini, hotel ini tidak ada pengumuman evakuasi atau apapun pengumuman soal gempa ini, saya dan anak anak turun sendiri, dan kita memaksakan turun pakai lift walau itu bahaya, sesampainya di lobby, suasana tenang2 sekali, dari staff tidak ada yang berusaha menenangkan tamu yang terlihat bingung turun dari kamar. Saya paham Padang adalah Area yang sangat sering terjadi Gempa, tapi Hotel adalah Bussiness Service, dan rata rata tamu yang stay berasal dari luar Kota Padang. Saya sempat ngobrol dengan seorang anak laki laki yang sendirian di lobby, dia berasal dari lantai 10, laptop dan botol minumnya sampai jatuh karena gempa, dan karena orang tuanya tidak ada, anak tersebut mengambil inisiatif turun ke lobby. Intinya TOLONG PERBAIKI STANDARD KESELAMATAN.       Dan yang terakhir tapi sangat penting adalah Makanan yang ada di Hotel ini sangat beda standard nya dengan Santika Premiere yang lain. Lontongnya keras sekali dan kerasa beras nya, Lupis nya juga sama kerasnya, dan taste makanannya keseluruhan tidak standar Santika Premiere.
title: STANDARD KESELAMATAN HOTEL TIDAK ADA

text:
Santika Premier Padang tereletak di lokasi yang cukup strategis, di pusat kota Padang, dekat ke sentra perkantoran, dekat juga ke lokasi objek wisata, dan disekitarnya juga banyak kuliner.

Hotel ini masih sangat baru di Kota Padang, baru menjelang akhir Tahun 2021.

Ada beberapa poin plus dan ada juga poin minus untuk kebaikan kedepannya.

Poin-poin plus Santika Premier Padang per Desember 2021 menurut kami:
1. Lokasi sangat strategis, dekat ke perkantoran, dekat ke objek wisata
2. Banyak area kuliner di sekitarnya, kuliner khas Padang dan juga kuliner nasional.
3. Hotel baru, jadi semua masih fresh, baru, dan kekinian.
4. Di lobby ada Piano, jadi buat yg suka musik sambil nunggu check ini bisa dengerin alunan musik dari piano, atau bahkan bisa mainin pianonya.
5. Di lobby juga ada Coffee lounge, yang sudah saya coba coffee nya enak, oiya ada bermacam pilihan cake juga.
6. View dari kamar, dari Tower 2 kamu bisa melihat pemandangan kota dan pergunungan, sedangkan dati Tower 1 view nya Pantai.
7. Resto nya di lantai 2, dimalam hari kami mencoba nongkrong ngopi di restonya, view dari resto bagus, view kerlap kerlip lampu lampu kota padang, coffee nya mantap, penyajiannya juga oke. Oiya juga ada Ice cake yang rasanya pasti disukai anak. Untuk Jumat malam dan sabtu malam di restonya ada pilihan all u can eat buffee 150k per orang.
8. Menu sarapan variatif, lokal dan western. Rasanya juga enak. Kebersihan di Resto nya jiga sangat diperhatikan.
9. Kamar Deluxe hollywood nya cukup lega, desain interiornya minimalis modern. Fresh desain. Kamar juga bersih pastinya. Oiya juga ada balkon yang menghadap ke mountaint view.
10. Staff cukup ramah dan responsif.

Oiya juga ada beberapa poin yang menjadi perhatian kami untuk lebih diperbaiki kedepannya,
1. Lantai di Lorong lantai 5 tower 2 masih terdapat bekas-bekas dempul yang belum dibersihkan, jadi masih agak kurang rapi.
2. AC kamar agak berisik jika kipasnya 3 keatas, jadi kami hanya mengecilkan kipas AC nya dan menurunkan suhu AC nya.
3. Peralatan di Gym nya sangat terbatas, bisa dibilang sedikit. Semoga kedepannya lebih diperhatikan.
4. Kolam renangnya agak kecil, dan juga tidak ada view yang keluar (No beach view, No mountaint view) saat nongkrong disekitar kolamnya.
5. Per Desember 2021 Sky Lounge nya belum launching.
6. Per Desember 2021 juga masih banyak material pekerjaan di sekitar parkiran basement, jadi masi terlihat berantakan.

Semoga kedepannya bisa lebih baik dan bagus lagi Santika Premier Padang.

Next time kalo sky launge nya udah selesai kami coba staycation lagi.

text: This was our first time to Padang in Sumatra Indonesia.  In traveling to other areas, we found that Padang was a wonderful city.  We were fortunate enough to have stayed at the Hotel Santika Premiere Padang.  In review of the accommodations, I want to say that the rooms were clean and very comfortable.  The dining was nice and had many options that one could choose from. The reason I’m writing this review is mainly about the staff and team working together at the Hotel.  When traveling away from home you are looking for great accommodations and a friendly and helpful face.  I need to call out Dako (in the picture).  Others who helped us were Martha and Anan. They were the friendliest people I have ever met.  I am not a smoker and was issued a smoking room.  Not anyone’s fault.  If it was not for Dako he made all things right and changed my accommodations.   Being in the business world your employees are what makes your company.  In this case, we plan to come back again and there is no other Hotel that we would stay.  Thank you Dako and your Team.  We hope to see you soon again on our next trip from the United States.
title: Amazing Team

text:
Staying in this brand new Santika, I enjoyed the room very much. It was spacious, neat, bright and clean. Over a two-night stay, I slept very well on a comfy bed and pillow. All amenities, especially the air condition worked really. It was the first time in my hotel stay in Indonesia that I shivered because the room was very cold (the temperature on the air condition was actually 22 degree but felt like teens degree) so I had to turn the air condition of for about 5 minutes. Five stars for the room! 
I also went up the lounge at the 10th floor that gave us a gorgeous view of the city. The lounge was comfy to have conversations with friends. We had a tasty meal but it was pricey even for Jakarta standard. The breakfast was the 2nd floor. The dining room was spacious but the choices were limited. There were traditional dishes provided but the taste was mostly mediocre at best. Three stars for dining. Sorry!
Last but not least was the lobby. It felt grandeur and was well designed. It was so grand, it looked empty. Some additional tables and chairs might be needed. The check in and check out process was seamless. Courteous and helpful receptionists. Four stars for the lobby.
title: Comfy bed but mediocre foods

text: I booked two nights at Santika in Padang ecpecting an above average place for indonesian standards. This hotel exceeded my expectations by far. The room was excellent, and there was plenty of free watee and accessories that they dont charge you for. Best of all though was the service. There is always someone arpund that speaks good english and even if you have unusual request or want advice for travelling, need them make a call for you they help you with great effort. I went spearfishing and came into the lobby with a huge mackarel fish - wich the outstanding kitchen team prepared for me even at 8pm in the evening without any warning beforehand. I highly recommend this hotel and i will defintely return here.

text:
We were picked up from the airport by Mr. Mitra and ended up using Santika's transportation for the next 2 days. Although not originally from Padang, you could tell Mitra did his homework well: he was very informative, drove us safely to Bukittinggi and back ,and accompanied my mother and aunt, who are both in their 70s, well... so it became such a memorable short Vacay!
The hotel itself is new with nice, modern rooms. The breakfast buffet was almost perfect, I only wished there was some cheese served;) Its location is central surrounded by many restaurants, and it's near the coast. We really enjoyed our morning walks.

text:
Booked a one night stay as MyValue member, took an extra time to confirm my reservation been made through the app but the rest was easy. As one of the newest hotels in the city, surely the stay didn’t leave any bad taste. Everything was perfect.  The room, amenities, the breakfast, the whole service. I was usually bothered by the sink appearance outside the bathroom, but somehow I didn’t mind it here. The bathroom and the toilet are in separated rooms. 
I got to say, staying in this hotel would be perfect for business trip, hence the easy access and the ambience I felt during the stay. But it suits solo or even family staying with the kids, as the pool is provided on the second floor, next to the restaurant.
Hoping the management would keep up with the consistency of their service, as I will definitely come back and stay in this hotel soon in the future.
title: Satisfactory Unlocked!

text:
The hotel is nice, strategic location close to restaurants and ATMs. Beautiful scenery. The city of Padang is clearly visible. The room is spacious. Separate bathroom and toilet. During the pandemic the towels provided were wrapped in plastic to keep them hygienic. There is also a safety box to keep valuable things.

For breakfast, the foods are delicious. They have so many dessert. Uniquely, there are various kinds of traditional Indonesian herbal drinks provided (jamu). Got a complimentary cake also for a birthday from the hotel management. Overall satisfied with the services of Santika Hotel.  All hotel staff are friendly and very helpful. 🤍
title: Satisfied

Thank you very much for staying with us and I appreciate you for sharing your comments with us and we are looking forward to welcoming you back soon!

Best Regards,
